document.full_text: alassane ouattara, ivory coast's internationally recognized president, has rejected the african union's nomination of an envoy due to negotiate an end to the crisis in the country, questioning his impartiality.
document.title: ouattara rejects au envoy for ivorian crisis
lines_and_colors: alassane ouattara, ivory coast's internationally recognized president, has rejected the african union's nomination of an envoy due to negotiate an end to the crisis in the country, questioning his impartiality.
